Justification: Less common to present immediately with cyanosis unless shunt reverses; may be associated with irregular heart sensations.

Justification: Usually presents with murmurs early on; cyanosis would suggest large shunts or Eisenmenger physiology.

Justification: Irregular heartbeat sensation and unwell feeling; unlikely to cause cyanosis from birth but could explain irregularity.
9. Diagnosis: Hemoglobinopathies (e.g., Sickle cell disease)
Justification: Can cause cyanosis and unwell feeling, but less likely to have congenital onset and irregular heartbeat sensations from birth unless complicated.
